DOC.detailed_description: The modern treatment IC multi-modal treatment include behavioural treatment , physiotherapy pelvic floor musculature , oral medication ( e.g . Amitryptiline ) intra-vesical instillation ( e.g . DMSO , steroid , heparin ) . These treatment find effective number study approve FDA . However , optimal duration intra-vesical instilation know . All patient IC ( accord international continence society criterion ) receive 12 weekly intra-vesical instillation DMSO . All patient fill O'leary-Sant questionaire urination diary treatment , 3 , 6 , 9 12 treatment 6 week , 3 , 6 12 month end treatment .
